Articles.Content:
Hi guys!

I was thinking the other day about Easter Eggs in KSP.

I think we need to find more. MORE!!!!!!

Apparently there are two new easter eggs:

  • Mysterious rock, on the continent which looks like Africa, not a terrain rock, but it sits above the ground, likely movable.[coordinates missing]
  • Strange formations of islands, near the continent which looks like South America.[coordinates missing].

Ã¢â‚¬â€¹http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/List_of_easter_eggs

But of course the coordinates are missing.

So lets find them!

450+ points for finding one of these two easter eggs.

500+ points for an easter egg on the MÃƒÂ¼n or Kerbin.

1000+ Points for another easter egg on any Celestial Body.

100+ Points for a LOGICAL explanation on what the easter egg is and why it is there.

Must be an undiscovered easter egg.

Also post how you found them!

Good Luck!

Welcome to the forum!

Nice first post, but I'm afraid your challenge might get defeated by this post: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/95806-25-Easter-Egg-Hunt

Oh Crud. Nuuuuuuuu

Alright i'll start hunting and post on that thread.
